ygData.subject: Re: Bristlebane
ygData.msgSnippet: Does anyone happen to know how to find out what your religion is in case you have forgotten? Tadian
ygData.messageBody:
Does anyone happen to know how to find out what your religion is in case you have
forgotten?

Tadian

Bosmun wrote:

> From: "Bosmun" <bosmun@...>
>
> Hi all. My bard is a follower of Bristlebane, and I've been hoping to find
> a temple or shrine to him, so that I can make a journey there in game
> sometime, but I'm at a loss. Does anyone know if there are any temples or
> shrines to Bristlebane? I fear it may be in one of the evil cities, that I
> haven't visited yet.
>
> Bien -- Karana
